Description:
311981763 - IN/MP/33/221021/1 - Served for failure to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the rotating chuck and tool of the XYZ vertical milling machine (serial number 12042).

311981776 - IN/MP/33/221021/2 - Served for failure to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate for the effective organisation, control, monitoring and review of the preventive and protective measures that have been provided to prevent injury, namely the guarding to protect employees from the dangerous parts of machinery.

311981800 - IN/MP/33/221021/3 - Served for failure to ensure that exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid (a respiratory sensitiser and cause of dermatitis) used on the HAAS EC-400 CNC machine (serial number 2053591), is prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.
